forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High 12C. SW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 54F. SW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
